  Destructor grew a little impatient. "Are we ready to test this cloneing 
scheme of your or what?"

:Death: he quickly worked on the little device. He knew he could find a virus 
to kill them. As he drew closer he got the idea...a pulse wich affected only 
devices fitting their signature. He prepared the devise right away. After not 
too long he sent the pulse. It shook a little but it should work
